chart_description: The Schedulability chart shows the status of the nodes in the Kubernetes cluster, indicating whether they are currently schedulable or not. A node is considered unschedulable if it does not meet the resource requirements of the running pods or if it is undergoing maintenance.

dimension_descriptions.schedulable: This dimension indicates whether the node is currently schedulable or not. A value of 1 represents that the node is schedulable, whereas a value of 0 indicates that it is currently unschedulable.
